import React,{useState} from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Container, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; function Description() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [disabled,setDisabled] = useState(true) return (

Tumor Annotation task

Task Description

In this task, you are going to detect and annotate tumor in ten different images.

Task Guideliness

  • Fill out the questionnaire
  • Watch the tutorial – you can always rewatch it
  • Perform a quick knowledge check
  • Annotate the images
  • Receive your payment code

Interface Instructions

  • Press and hold left mouse button to annotate
  • You can zoom in and out with “+/- “in the upper left corner (???)
  • You can adjust the brightness with …(???)
  • Press “next image” when finished with annotating
  • Your progress will be saved automatically
  • For help, you can always rewatch the tutorial with the button “help"
); } export default Description;
